attributes.description: Formal constraint on the assumed primitive `Iso8601_date_time` type, in the form of one or more `Interval<Iso8601_date_time>`.
attributes.name: constraint

attributes.description: Default value set in a template, and present in an operational template. Generally limited to leaf and near-leaf nodes.
attributes.name: default_value

attributes.description: Value to be assumed if none sent in data.
attributes.name: assumed_value

functions.meaning: Validity of month in constrained date.
functions.name: month_validity

functions.meaning: Validity of day in constrained date.
functions.name: day_validity

functions.meaning: Validity of minute in constrained time.
functions.name: minute_validity

functions.meaning: Validity of second in constrained time.
functions.name: second_validity

functions.meaning: Validity of millisecond in constrained time.
functions.name: millisecond_validity

functions.meaning: Validity of timezone in constrained date/time.
functions.name: timezone_validity

meta_info.description: Constraint on instances representing date/times, i.e. instants in time.
meta_info.name: C_DATE_TIME
